sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting"> <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <code_url/> <code_url_2/> <details/> <example_steps/> <example_url/> <module/> <number>SNSCRIPT0001084</number> <replaced_by/> <script>Check advanced button.  task.short_description = "Please deliver the requested software to " + current.variables.requested_for.getDisplayValue();  or from a catalog task  task.short_description = "Delivery Software to " + current.request.requested_for.name; </script> <script_2/> <script_type>Workflow</script_type> <short_description>To refernce a variable (requested_for) in the short description of a catalog task</short_description> <state>Submitted</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-28 18:45:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2136630113296240e5adbd522244b098</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-28 18:45:45</sys_updated_on> <tested_on_helsinki/> </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting> </record_update>
